title.en: The Young Lady Can't Escape From Her Doting Husband ♡

altTitles.vi: Em Không Thể Thoát Khỏi Tay Của Ta Đâu
Những Cô Gái Trẻ Không Thể Thoát Khỏi Người Chồng Lấm Lem
Tuyển Tập Oneshot Của Các Tiểu Thư Không Thể Thoát Khỏi Người Chồng Quyến Rũ

description.en:
The first prince, a childhood friend, a general, and an assassin - what if they suddenly ask for love…?! An anthology from “Moonlight novels” that collects the adorable stories of young women and charming men! Includes one-shots with plenty of lovely and sweet R-rated scenes. We will give you a lovely romance with high sugar content!

---
**Volume 1:**
Cover Art: Hachibi ☆ Wan
1. "Akuyaku Reijou wa Nigedashitai" (悪役令嬢は逃げ出したい; The Villainess Can't Escape; The Villainess Wants to Flee), Art by Momo Fuyukusa, Story by Sumire Akane, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n9077ey/): Reincarnated into the body of the villainess, Lucier, who is about to be engaged to the main capture target and crown prince, Leonhardt, can she escape her death flag?
2. "Konyaku Haki no go Riyou wa Keikakuteki ni" (姫君は若き将軍に溺れる; The Princess Is Weak Towards the Young General), Art by Shin Kitamura, Story by Itsuki Tachibana, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0831fr/)
3. "Moujiki Otome Game no Hajimaru Kisetsudesuga, Mob no Watashi mo Taihendesu" (もうじき乙女ゲームの始まる季節ですが、モブのわたしも大変です; The Otome Game's Season Will Begin, but It's Too Difficult for Me Who's a Mob), Art by Hato Tsutsumi, Story by Katsura Usui, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n6177em/)
4. "Himegimi wa Wakaki Shougun ni Oboreru" (婚約破棄のご利用は計画的に; The Use of the Engagement Braking Was Planned), Art by Shima Nekonomori, Story by Saki Ouya, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n2296ep/) | [PG Version](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4350gn/)

**Volume 2:**
Cover Art: Hachibi ☆ Wan
1. "The Patriot Knight Won't Stop Seducing Me" (救国の騎士様からえっちな言葉が止まりませんっ), Art by Potagi, Story by Mizuno Emu, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0765gi/)
2. "The Ice Lady and the Flame Prince" (氷の令嬢と炎の王子), Art by Harumi Taku, Story by Cider, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n3023gr/)
3. "The Knight's Sweet Trap ~Aphrodisiac Won't Work on Me! (Maybe)~" (騎士団長の甘い罠 ~私に媚薬はききません! (多分)~), Art by Shizuku, Story by AzagishiQ, [Original Web Novel](https://xmypage.syosetu.com/mypageblog/view/xid/299643/blogkey/264669/)
4. "Akuyaku Reijou wa Nigerarenai" (悪役令嬢は逃げられない; The Villainess Cannot Escape), Art by Momo Fuyukusa, Story by Sumire Akane, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n2246ez/)
5. "My Life Was Switched With My Sister's Who Was Condemned, but, for Some Reason, My Yandere Husband Came Along" (断罪された妹と人生チェンジしたのに、何故かヤンデレ夫がもれなくついてくるのですが。), Art by Kurage Alto, Story by Iseya Reki, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n9647gf/)

**Volume 3:**
Cover Art: ウエハラ蜂
1. 春待の猫姫と白虎の旦那様, Art by KIKUTA Yui, Story by 宮田紗音, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0634gs/)
2. "I Want to Withdraw My Candidacy" (私、辞退したいと思います。), Art by Mikoto Kaname, Story by Shirahata Sagari, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0535cw/)
3. 鉄仮面冷血騎士は、心の中でだけ愛を叫ぶ。, Art by Shizuku, Story by 椎名さえら, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0958gy/)
4. 炎の王子と氷の令嬢, Art by Harumi Taku, Story by Cider, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0705gt/)
5. 黒騎士を癒やした責任は誰にあるのか, Art by MIKANAGI Fubito, Story by 久万シロ, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0539gz/)
description.vi:
Đệ nhất hoàng tử, một người bạn thuở nhỏ, một vị tướng quân, và một sát thủ - sẽ ra sao nếu họ đột ngột ngỏ lời yêu …?!  
Tuyển tập từ “Tiểu thuyết ánh trăng” thu thập những câu chuyện đáng yêu của những thiếu nữ và những người đàn ông quyến rũ!  
Bao gồm 4 cảnh quay với nhiều cảnh quay được xếp hạng R đáng yêu và ngọt ngào. Chúng tôi sẽ cung cấp cho bạn một sự lãng mạn đáng yêu với hàm lượng đường siêu cao!!!!  


---

**Volume 1 Information:**  
||**The Villainess Can't Escape**  
Artist: Fuyukusa Momo Original: [Akane Sumire](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n9077ey/)  
  
**The Princess Is Weak Towards the Young General**  
Artist: Nekonomori Shima Original: Saki Ouya  
  
**The Use of Engagement Cancellation Was Planned**  
Artist: Kitamura Shin Original: Itsuki Tachibana  
  
**The Otome Game’s Season Will Begin, but It’s Too Difficult for Me Who’s a Mob**  
Artist: Tsutsumi Hato Original: Usui Katsura||
